value:
I asked Commander Anna what she'd
like for the winter festival, and she
said "money."$k$pI think I'll stick to asking kids that
question. I'm not sure my holiday
spirit will survive otherwise.

Before you summoned me, I was at a
winter festival party at Ylisstol. The
entire halidom is in fine spirits!

I'm feeling chilly again today... I need
to come up with a plan to stay warm.
I hope no one catches a cold.

Which Heroes are naughty, and
which are nice? Just whisper their
names into my ear.$k$pI'll keep that info tucked away until
the next winter festival.

I was just taking care of my tree. It's
a bit of a pain to keep all of the
decorations on it during battle.

Happy winter festival! I come with
greetings, but no gifts, from your
friend $Nf.

I will use this power to make the
winter festival even more exciting!

My stocking was filled with
potential for battle, I suppose.

This is no good at all! I'm trying
to enjoy the winter festival...

Well, if you're going to give me a
gift, I'll do the best I can with it!

My name is Robin. If you want
someone to plan winter festivities,
you're in luck. Leave it all to me.

I was just mulling over a plan. What
plan? How to help my dear friend—
that's you—enjoy the winter festival.$k$pWell, first, you're going to need a red
outfit like mine.$k$pThen we'd decorate a tree and eat a
huge feast. When it got late, we'd
go around delivering presents...$k$pIt's hard to put presents next to
everyone's pillows without waking
them up, you realize.$k$pWe're both tacticians, though, so I'm
sure we could figure it out.$k$pIn fact, maybe we should brainstorm
some tactics before we begin. This is
kind of exciting—a council of war!$k$pI've been looking forward to winter
ever since I got here, you see...$k$pIf I got my wish, I'd spend the winter
festival with you for years to come!
はいっ
What about this?
うわあ！？
Wha?!
Got you something!
You've been naughty!
Now that's festive!
To all a good night!
Party's over...
Heehee
It's really hot in this hat.
You summoned me mid-party with Chrom and the others.
I hope this outfit doesn't make me too much of a target on the battlefield.
I've got a plan to give everyone presents. I'm going to place them while folks are sleeping!
It's not the hat, it's the head that wears it, right?
I can't find my favorite strategy book. Did I forget to bring it?
I gather that when I wear this outfit, I'm supposed to ask you if you want a gift?
OK.
Got it.
Yeah.
Got any plans for the holidays?
